tool.name: GodmdRun
tool.description: : Wrapper of the GOdMD tool module.

param.name: input_pdb_orig_path
param.label: input PDB file
param.help: Input PDB file to be used as origin in the conformational transition. Format: [input].pdb

param.name: input_pdb_target_path
param.label: input PDB file
param.help: Input PDB file to be used as target in the conformational transition. Format: [input].pdb

param.name: input_aln_orig_path
param.label: input ALN,TXT file
param.help: Input GOdMD alignment file corresponding to the origin structure of the conformational transition. Format: [input].[format]

param.name: input_aln_target_path
param.label: input ALN,TXT file
param.help: Input GOdMD alignment file corresponding to the target structure of the conformational transition. Format: [input].[format]

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax
